conbody.p: (a) Use the provision at 252.204-7008 , Compliance with Safeguarding Covered Defense Information Controls, in all solicitations, including solicitations using FAR part 12 procedures for the acquisition of commercial items, except for solicitations solely forthe acquisition of commercially available off-the-shelf (COTS) items.

(b) Use the clause at 252.204-7009 , Limitations on the Use or Disclosure of Third- Party Contractor Reported Cyber Incident Information, in all solicitations and contracts, including solicitations and contracts using FAR part 12 procedures for the acquisition of commercial items, for services that include support for the Governmentâ€™s activities related to safeguarding covered defense information and cyber incident reporting.

(c) Use the clause at 252.204-7012 , Safeguarding Covered Defense Information and Cyber Incident Reporting, in all solicitations and contracts, including solicitations andcontracts using FAR part 12 procedures for the acquisition of commercial items, exceptfor solicitations and contracts solely for the acquisition of COTS items.
